query.statement: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 현금 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT D.SALES_CASH_RECEIVE_NUM, D.ALT_DATE, I.OCCUR_DATE, (SELECT TP.TYPE_NM FROM SLA_TYPE_CD_MST TP WHERE TP.TYPE_GRP_CD = '013' AND TP.TYPE_CD = M.ALT_TYPE_CD) ALT_TYPE_CD_NM, (SELECT CC.CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.GROUP_CODE = 'CASH_OCCUR_CLASS' AND CC.CODE = I.CASH_OCCUR_CLASS) CASH_OCCUR_CLASS, D.ACCT_CD, D.RECEIVE_AMT, D.OCCUR_AMT, NVL(D.OCCUR_AMT - D.RECEIVE_AMT,0) AS TOT_AMT, DECODE(D.JOURNALZ_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) AS JOURNALZ_YN, D.JOURNALZ_NUM, D.REMARK, M.CC_CD, (SELECT CC_NM FROM SCC_CC WHERE CC_CD = M.CC_CD) AS INQUERY_CC_NM, I.CUST_CD, (SELECT CUSTNM FROM ST_CUST WHERE CUSTCD = I.CUST_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS CUSTNM, M.INQUERY_UPJANG_CD, (SELECT UPJANGNM FROM ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = M.INQUERY_UPJANG_CD) AS UPJANG_NM, (SELECT SUSPENSE_ALT_NUM FROM SLA_SALES_CASH_ALT_MST CM WHERE CM.SALES_CASH_RECEIVE_NUM = D.SALES_CASH_RECEIVE_NUM AND CM.RECD_STATUS = 'L') SUSPENSE_ALT_NUM FROM SLA_SALES_CASH_ALT_DETAIL D , SLA_SALES_CASH_ALT_MST M , SLA_SALES_CASH_OCCUR_INFO I WHERE D.SALES_CASH_RECEIVE_NUM = M.SALES_CASH_RECEIVE_NUM AND D.SALES_CASH_NUM = I.SALES_CASH_NUM AND D.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND M.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND I.RECD_STATUS = 'L' AND D.CC_CD = (SELECT CC_CD FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND M.ALT_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#DATEFR#||'01') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE((#DATETO#||'01'),'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY M.ALT_DATE DESC
